attributes.action: call a General Election as soon as possible to give the voters of Great Britain their rightful chance to rid Parliament of MPs who have let us all down with their money-grabbing and shameful abuse of the expenses system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the country should be given the option to cast our vote, and so pass judgement, on the current group of MPs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
